title: freebitco.in PR
author: freebitco.in PR
content: This is the official FUNToken thread for updates and announcements in the world of FUN. We have a ton of new developments in the works, so engage, communicate, and follow this thread to be involved with FUNToken.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: It looks like there will be a big update that FreeBitcoin will do for fun tokens, so create a special thread for the development of this coin. I became a big fan of fun tokens after freebitcoin took over because of the great offers from your casino. Maybe you could consider making the announcement thread more interesting and including a roadmap of fun so that more people can read and be interested.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: As an investor of FUN token I'm glad to see you are giving special attention to this project. I was expecting for this before, although recently I've felt FUN in second plan by freebitco.in's team, without further announcements and updates.But now with this thread and frequent updates I hope FUN can spread among more crypto enthusiasts and grow stronger than ever.FUN is the most powerful gambling token in crypto market and to remain on this position for longer, constant development of new features is needed.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Which FUNToken are we talking about? This one? https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/funtoken/If yes, then this project is more dead than alive. 6 years have passed, no development, although capitalization is still maintained, apparently due to trading on Binance. This token is definitely not suitable for holding, rather for short-term stock speculation, it has a bearish graph. 4 cents in 2021 was probably the limit for this project and it is unlikely to go higher.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on March 17, 2023, 03:43:59 PMWhich FUNToken are we talking about? This one? https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/funtoken/If yes, then this project is more dead than alive. 6 years have passed, no development, although capitalization is still maintained, apparently due to trading on Binance. This token is definitely not suitable for holding, rather for short-term stock speculation, it has a bearish graph. 4 cents in 2021 was probably the limit for this project and it is unlikely to go higher.IIRC, there was also another token that was named the same as the Fun token. But on this specific token that OP is representing from freebitco.in. It seems that it's a yes that it was the fun token that you pointed out because I've done my quick research and I haven't found the other fun token and probably removed by the websites coinmarketcap and coingecko. I agree that the chart isn't attractive looking at the perspective of how the development went. But for short term people, they'll be encouraged to dive in because of the daily volume as it's looking good.

comments.author: mbakruroh
comments.body: Quote from: freebitco.in PR on March 17, 2023, 11:23:08 AMThis is the official FUNToken thread for updates and announcements in the world of FUN. We have a ton of new developments in the works, so engage, communicate, and follow this thread to be involved with FUNToken. We recommend you write this on ANN, and you create an official thread specifically talking about FUN tokens. There you can update information continuously about the development of FUN tokens. Whether it's about the community or other things related to the FUN token. What's more, you gave the topic title "announcements", so it's appropriate to discuss it in the announcements sub.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on March 17, 2023, 03:43:59 PMWhich FUNToken are we talking about? This one? https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/funtoken/If yes, then this project is more dead than alive. 6 years have passed, no development, although capitalization is still maintained, apparently due to trading on Binance. This token is definitely not suitable for holding, rather for short-term stock speculation, it has a bearish graph. 4 cents in 2021 was probably the limit for this project and it is unlikely to go higher.The benefits of FUN aren't only about holding it, but holding it in partnership with freebitco.in website, so you can make income from staking and also from the premium program which rewards you daily with Wheel of Fortune spins and extra daily interest over your bitcoin balance. There is also the exclusive FUN casino, Dplay. It's a token for investors and gamblers.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: freebitco.in PR on March 17, 2023, 11:23:08 AMThis is the official FUNToken thread for updates and announcements in the world of FUN. We have a ton of new developments in the works, so engage, communicate, and follow this thread to be involved with FUNToken. This looks great. I am holding some FUN tokens as well and was hoping something like this comes up where we can stay up to date with the latest developments in the FUN token.Now that this thread is live can you provide us any updates on any new developments deployed or being implemented or any future updates.It would be great to get some insights in here.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on March 17, 2023, 03:55:06 PMBut for short term people, they'll be encouraged to dive in because of the daily volume as it's looking good.In the short term, speculating on fan tokens is not a good idea, because short-term is a risky business in itself. Bitcoin in the short term can deprive many traders of their money, and a fan token that has no bottom and no strong support can deprive money ten times faster. Fan tokens are a profitable tool only for their creators, any owner of these tokens is already in the risk group, so if someone wants to profit from tokens in the short term, then look better at projects from top-100, they are much more reliable and attractive.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: freebitco.in PR on March 17, 2023, 11:23:08 AMThis is the official FUNToken thread for updates and announcements in the world of FUN. We have a ton of new developments in the works, so engage, communicate, and follow this thread to be involved with FUNToken. If you want to make this one as an announcement thread or even as a discussion thread for FUN token, you should include more details about the token. Team behind it, tokenomics, roadmap and recent developments.The thread is lack of all those information and if I didn't know about FUN token, it is hard for me to know what is the token. At least you should give link to Coinmarketcap, Coingecko and available exchanges and trading links. Nowadays, many tokens have same token ticker that can be very misleading and confusing for new people.
